Container.Name: smtp-relay
Container.Overview:
A lightweight SMTP relay server designed for Docker environments. This image enables containers to send outgoing emails through two configurable modes:
1. Direct Mode: Sends emails directly to recipients 2. Smart Host Mode: Relays mail through an intermediate SMTP server
Based on Debian 12 with exim4-daemon-light, it provides a simple yet flexible email solution. Configure using environment variables for relay host, port, credentials, and network settings.
For detailed configuration options and examples, visit: https://github.com/bokazio/smtp-relay
